item.description:
This week we will focus on Yin/Yang energies and practices to:


  • Activate and focus your energy
  • Open to receive love and be nourished
  • Harmonize your internal energies
  • Circulate sexual energy (Kundalini) throughout the body


White Tantra is comprised of internal practices to cultivate your creative, orgasmic and spiritual potential. Learn simple yet powerful energy practices from White Tantra to:

♦ Access your power to Manifest what it is you truly desire!
♦ Expand your capacity for Connection and Pleasure!
♦ Become empowered as the source of your own Happiness!
♦ Ground, Clear and Protect your energy field!
♦ Infuse Passion and Vitality into all aspects of your life!

This entry-level class is open to novices and experienced practitioners alike. No partner necessary. These are clothes-on, hands-off, solo practices. This introductory class lays the groundwork for my more advanced classes. Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Please refrain from wearing fragrances. Bring a water bottle. You can pay with credit card via the Paypal link, or bring cash or check to class.
item.how_to_find_us: Come upstairs through the door to the left of the Burren Pub.
item.name: Tantric Energy Fundamentals: Yin/Yang Polarity
